title: beyond
content: “集中-分散-再集中”，投资者的心路历程

title: something about eth 2020-4-17
content:
以太坊挖矿还能挖到吗？2019年最实用的四款以太坊挖矿软件

N卡挖矿新神器Bminer【良心推荐】ZEC/BTG/ZCL/HUSH/ZEN

Bminer下载

ETH/ETC挖矿教程：Bminer & Ethminer

说说我挖过的几个以太坊（ETH Ethereum）矿池

To mine [Ethereum](https://www.ethereum.org/) on Windows on [ethermine.org](https://ethermine.org/): * Download and extract Bminer into a folder (e.g. C:\bminer) * Edit mine_eth.bat and change the parameters according to https://www.bminer.me. * Open command line prompt and run mine_eth.bat. * Enjoy mining :-) To dual mine [Ethereum](https://www.ethereum.org/) and [Decred](https://www.decred.org/) on Windows: * Download and extract Bminer into a folder (e.g. C:\bminer) * Edit mine_eth_dcr.bat and change the parameters according to https://www.bminer.me. * Open command line prompt and run mine_eth_dcr.bat. * Enjoy mining :-) To dual mine [Ethereum](https://www.ethereum.org/) and [Verge](https://vergecurrency.com/) on Windows: * Download and extract Bminer into a folder (e.g. C:\bminer) * Edit mine_eth_xvg.bat and change the parameters according to https://www.bminer.me. * Open command line prompt and run mine_eth_xvg.bat. * Enjoy mining :-)

bminer -uri ethproxy://0xb76d43eAaB2e905028a7f0F3aF13C7A84c477B9f.worker@eth.f2pool.com:8008 -uri2 tensority://bm1q4fcqllxe0k05utju0r8uyd9ysm3y8tdu6al6ta.worker@btm.f2pool.com:9221 -dual-intensity 2

btc bch

获取比特币为什么要挖矿？为什么挖矿需要矿池？
